nodes.text: JP Balmet, full name John-Paul Balmet, is an artist who lives in Redwood City, California, United States. He is a concept designer for Lucasfilm Animation.

He was hired as a concept designer for Lucasfilm Animation in November 2010. In 2011, he drew concept art of the Falleen Black Sun Vigos for "Eminence," an episode of Star Wars: The Clone Wars. He worked on Gungi and Katooni of another episode, "The Gathering."
